testsuite.name: POSITIVE TC-E2E / Create a user

testcase.name: Verify if the response code is 201 Created
Verify if the response time is < 3 seconds
Verify if the response body is received from server
Verify if the response body received is valid
Verify if the response body is received in JSON format
Verify if response headers don't reveal project specific details
Verify if gender is [male, female]
Verify if status is [active, inactive]
Verify if name=Swetha & email=swetha@yahoo.com

testsuite.name: POSITIVE TC-E2E / Verify if user is created

testcase.name: Verify if the response code is 200 OK
Verify if the response time is < 2 seconds
Verify if the response body is received from server
Verify if the response body received is valid
Verify if the response body is received in JSON format
Verify if response headers don't reveal project specific details
Verify if user is created with id : 8074433
Verify if user is created with name : Webster

testsuite.name: POSITIVE TC-E2E / Update the created user

testcase.name: Verify if the response code is 200 OK
Verify if the response time is < 3 seconds
Verify if the response body is received from server

Verify if the response body is received in JSON format
Verify if response headers don't reveal project specific details
Verify if gender is [male, female]
Verify if status is [active, inactive]
Verify if name=Kiran-Trainer

Verify if the response body is received from server
